**Edited <time datetime="2018-08-01T08:59:11Z" title="08/01/2018 08:59  AM" data-short="5 yr">August 1, 2018</time> by flying\_chair**
Yes, quite indeed sir, I too believe these law un-abiders should be punished with all our available resources. Quite.

> 
> whats a ork?

Iz you\'se \'avin a laff?! I\'se gonna order da boyz to gives you\'se a right beatin\'!
So basically, talk like a stereotypical chav. Right.

> 
> So basically, talk like a stereotypical chav. Right.

Well... Not really.

Chav\'s have a much higher tone whereas Orks are basically the deepest most guttural voice possible.

WAAAAGH!

CRUSH DEM UNDA DA DEFFROLLA!

Dis gam ehaz bin forgo'en

im gonna bring i' bak ye?
Za dashu snaku Zigur, Durgbu nazgshu, Durgbu dashshu!
